data.eml:eml: Taxonomy of the genus Phymatura J. Sahlberg (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae) in the Korean Peninsula

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kim, Yoon-Ho, Ahn, Kee-Jeong (2016): Taxonomy of the genus Phymatura J. Sahlberg (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Aleocharinae) in the Korean Peninsula. Zootaxa 4061 (2): 189-196, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4061.2.9
